name: Sugar Events Calendar – Ninja Forms Add-on
author: Studio164a

sections.description:
Sugar Events Calendar is an Event Calendar plugin for WordPress that allows you to easily manage events on your website.

This add-on to Sugar Events Calendar allows you to add a Ninja Forms form to your event pages, so that you can easily add registration forms. If you have one of Ninja Forms’ payment gateway add-ons installed (Stripe or Paypal Express), you can even take payment for event registrations.

This plugin requires Sugar Events Calendar and Ninja Forms.

This plugin does not require any configuration. Once you have installed it, you will be able to add a Ninja Form when editing your event.

Requirements

  • Sugar Events Calendar
  • Ninja Forms
  • WordPress 3.7+ (will probably work with earlier versions, but support will not be provided for older installations)
sections.installation:
1. Upload Sugar Events Calendar – Ninja Forms Add-on to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Add registrations forms for your Sugar Events Calendar events using Ninja Forms.
